EmailTemplate.name: Lead Nurturing.SOI Form Fill Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, your 2013 SOI Report is ready
EmailTemplate.textOnly: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, Thank you for expressing interest in MBO Partners' research on the independent workforce. Today, we released the 2013 data, and we'd like you to get a first look at our State of Independence report. 1. Access the full report <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/2013-MBO_Partners_State_of_Independence_Report.pdf> in PDF form. 2. View our infographics <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/americas-self-employed.html> to see graphical depictions of the data. 4. Read our press release <http://www.marketwire.com/press-release/mbo-partners-state-independence-report-reveals-independents-are-self-employed-successful-1828304.htm> for a summary of the research. If you have any questions about the report or independent work in America, feel free to email me. ___________________________________ Aassia Haq Chief Marketing Officer MBO Partners t: 703-793-6004 e: ahaq@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
